data.title: Kyle Richards And Husband Mauricio Umansky's Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: Kyle Richards said husband Mauricio Umansky moved out of their family home and opens up about if she plans to return to "The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills."
data.text:
Kyle Richards and her estranged husband, Mauricio Umansky, have quite literally started going their separate ways amid their separation.

The â€œReal Housewives of Beverly Hillsâ€ star shared during an appearance on the â€œB---- Bibleâ€ podcast May 14 that Umansky has moved out of their family home.

She confirmed to host Jackie Schimmel that Umansky moved to West Hollywood.

â€œThat was weird,â€ she explained.

â€œI always knew when that day came it would feel strange, very real,â€ she added.

Richards pointed out that as a mom of four with multiple dogs also under her roof, she's used to having â€œa busy household.â€

She said the day Umansky moved out of their family home was â€œjust strangeâ€ because everything was â€œso quiet.â€ Umansky moved while Richards was out of town, which she said was â€œthe smart thing to doâ€ because she thought it would be too hard to be there to witness it.

Richards also added that daughter Alexia Umansky recently moved out.

She told Schimmel she is â€œvery proudâ€ of how she and Umansky continue to get along and hang out together with their other family members.

As for what the next chapter looks like for Richards, she says she doesn't know.

â€œIâ€™ve never been on my own,â€ she said, adding she became a mom at 19.

She also seems on the fence about returning to â€œThe Real Housewives of Beverly Hillsâ€ â€” a show she has been on since its first season in 2010.

â€œThat is the big question right now,â€ she explained. â€œThe decision has to be made very, very soon, like, any minute.â€

She added a last-minute decision to return or not is â€œnot uncommonâ€ and that the toll last season took on her is a factor.

â€œI just donâ€™t know if I can do this,â€ she said. â€œThere are conversations being had.â€

Outside of the show, when it comes to her dating life at the moment, Richards said she needs â€œto take a beatâ€ and acknowledged both she and Umansky are free to â€œdo whateverâ€ they want amid their separation.

â€œIf someone flirts with me at a red light, I will hit the gas and go through the red light,â€ Richards said.

â€œI'm very uncomfortable,â€ she added, saying she also doesn't enjoy going to social events.

â€œI probably just need a minute,â€ she said.

Read on to learn more about Richards and Umanskyâ€™s relationship.

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky meet at a nightclub

In a 2021 interview with The Knot, Richards revealed she met Umansky at a nightclub called Bar One when they were in their 20s.

"Itâ€™s so funny to me because now our kids go there and weâ€™ll say â€˜well, thatâ€™s actually where we met 27 years ago.â€™ Twenty-seven-plus (years ago)! (Mauricio) thought I was Demi Mooreâ€™s sister â€” and I had actually been told that (before) â€” so he worked up the courage to come over and say hello, thinking that I was her sister," she said.

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky start dating

Once they started dating, Umansky said he was really taken with Richards' parenting skills.

At the time, Richards was already a mom to her oldest daughter, Farrah Brittany Aldjufrie, whom she welcomed in 1988 with her then-husband, Guraish Aldjufrie. The two were married from 1988 to 1992.

"She has an amazing soul. Sheâ€™s an amazing person. And quite honestly, the fact that she already had a daughter, it made dating a lot more important," Umansky told The Knot. "I had to take it much more seriously because I was responsible for a woman with a daughter. I also got insight into the way that she was as a mom and how good of a mom she was. And that gave me insight into the future and what it would look like."

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky get engaged

While recalling their engagement to The Knot, Umansky said he planned a "pretty, romantic evening" for them once he decided he wanted Richards to be his wife.

"The proposal, oh my God, I took Kyle out to (Santa Monica restaurant) Shutters... on a date, and I gave her a bouquet of flowers," he said. "And it was a very pretty, romantic evening and inside the flowers I had a rosebud case..."

Umansky noted that the ring box was shaped like a rosebud, and once Richards didn't notice he hid the ring box inside the flowers, he told her to smell the bouquet.

"Hereâ€™s the truth. I saw something that looked like a box, but I didnâ€™t want to be wrong and embarrass myself," Richards said.

Umansky added, "And then when she saw the box and she opened it and saw the ring, I got down on one knee and I asked her to marry me."

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky get married

In January 1996, Richards and Umansky got married in a Jewish wedding at a Bel-Air Country Club, they told The Knot.

Richards noted that they had a January wedding because she was pregnant with their first kid and her second child at the time, and she wanted to make sure her dress would fit.

"It was just amazing bringing my family together and his family and all of our friends. And itâ€™s so funny, Iâ€™ll never forget the day of our wedding, everyone had to wear kippahs on their head, and my family was like, â€˜Wait, whatâ€™s happening?â€™ I looked over and my brother-in-law, whoâ€™s not Jewish, was in the mirror putting it on and I was like, â€˜Okay, this is a first for our family,'" Richards recalled.

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky welcome their first child together

In 1996, Richards gave birth to her first child with Umansky, daughter Alexia.

After she graduated from Emerson College in 2018, Alexia went on to work for her father's real estate company, "The Agency," and is now a cast member in Netflix's "Buying Beverly Hills."

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky welcome their second child together

In 2000, the couple welcomed their daughter Sophia.

In 2022, Sophia graduated from George Washington University and received a sweet shoutout from her mom.

"So incredibly proud of you @sophiakylieee ğŸ˜­â¤ï¸ğŸ™ğŸ‘©ğŸ»â€ğŸ“ I love you so much & am so proud of you every day. But today my heart was bursting with pride ğŸ™," Richards wrote on Instagram.

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky welcome their third child together

In 2008, Umansky and Richards welcomed their youngest child, daughter Portia, together.

In 2017, Portia went to school dressed as her favorite superhero, which was her mom.

"Today Portia was supposed to dress as her favorite Superhero at school. She chose to go as me," Richards said on Instagram when she shared a pic of her daughter emulating her style. "Be still my beating heart !ğŸ’“ #humblebrag She said she had to wear gray sweatpants and a comfy shirt ğŸ™‹ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ When we got to school her principal said â€œLet me guess, youâ€™re your Momâ€ #daymade ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ğŸ‰."

Kyle Richards and Mauricio Umansky shoot down divorce rumors

In early 2023, rumors started to surface that Richards and Umansky were divorcing after 27 years of marriage.

In light of the reports, the couple issued a joint statement on Instagram, saying that â€œany claims regarding us divorcing are untrue.â€

â€œHowever, yes, we have had a rough year. The most challenging one of our marriage,â€ they wrote. "But we both love and respect each other tremendously. There has been no wrongdoing on anyone's part."

Mauricio Umansky confirms he and Kyle Richards and are separated

In October 2023, Umansky told People that he and Richards are â€œseparatedâ€ but are â€œnot throwing in the towelâ€ just yet.

â€œWeâ€™ve been married for 27 years, weâ€™re having a bit of a rough patch,â€ he said.

â€œSometimes life throws you different thingsâ€ and â€œyouâ€™ve gotta work through it," Umansky added.

Kyle Richards says fans will see the 'good and bad' moments from her life on Season 13 of 'RHOBH'

Richards took to Instagram ahead of the Season 13 premiere of â€œRHOBH" to tell her fans that they will see both "good and bad" moments from her life.

"Each season always brings surprise twists and turns. This season more than ever," she said. "I am normally one to isolate when I am struggling, so navigating through this time in my life while cameras were rolling was challenging to say the least. I am grateful that are plenty of fun times too."

"Ultimately that has been what has kept me coming back year after year. That and my relationships with the people that make RHOBH. Cast and crew. So, now itâ€™s time to sit back and watch ( and for me to relive these moments. Good and bad.)," Richards continued. "As always, thank you for watching. And thank you for coming along on this wild ride we call life #RHOBH."

Kyle Richards says she was 'taken aback' by pictures of Mauricio Umansky holding hands with his 'Dancing With the Stars' pro dancer partner

During an Oct. 25 appearance on "Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen," Richards spoke about some recent photos that were taken of Umansky and his Season 32 "Dancing With the Starsâ€ pro dancer partner, Emma Slater.

In the pics, it appears the two are holding hands.

When asked about the pictures, Richards said she was "taken aback" by the snapshots.

"Upset?" Andy Cohen asked.

"Yes," Richards replied. "That was very hard to see. That hurt my feelings."

When Cohen asked Richards if she thinks something is going on between Umanksy and Slater, she said she was unsure, even though the pictures seemed fishy.

â€œWell, the thing is this, I don't know if anything has happened yet, but obviously there is something there," Richards said. "Listen, I love him very much, and we are amicable, but that really did hurt me.â€

TODAY.com has reached out to Umansky and Slater for comment.

In light of the photos, Richards said she decided to delete an Instagram post she shared that supported Umansky's stint on the show. Even though she felt bothered by the pictures of him and Slater, she didn't let it affect her voting capabilities.

"I also voted for them," she said. "I have proof that I did too. I even sent the proof to the family chat. I did my votes, and I sent the screenshot to the family chat.â€

Kyle Richards reveals she was the 'driving force' behind her and Mauricio Umansky's separation

During her Oct. 25 appearance on â€œWatch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen," Richards revealed that she was â€œthe driving forceâ€ behind her split with Umansky.

â€œIt originated from me,â€ she said.

Richards said when the news of her and Umansky's split first came out, it was "really, really devastating" for their family.

"My kids were just crying and wouldn't leave the house," Richards said. "It was really, really difficult. Now they're much better, and they're really strong. They're just so together and so smart and they've been my best, best, best friends. I could not be more proud of them. They're amazing human beings. Thank God I have them."

She also shared that she and Umansky are still living in the same house but are sleeping in separate rooms.

Mauricio Umansky responds to dating rumors about him and Emma Slater

Amid Season 32 of "Dancing With the Stars," photos emerged of Umansky and Slater holding hands, stoking rumors that the two are in a relationship after his separation from Richards.

On Oct. 26, Umansky and Slater posed a selfie video during a rehearsal to set the record straight.

The dancing duo denied a romance in the video posted to Umanskyâ€™s Instagram story. They explained that theyâ€™ve become â€œreally good friendsâ€ while competing together on â€œDWTS.â€

After high-fiving each other for making it through the latest round of competition, Umansky changed gears.

â€œWe do want to address this story, this whole thing thatâ€™s going out and about whether or not Emma and I are dating, whether or not we went out on a date,â€ he said. â€œFor full clarity, we are not dating.â€

He explained that the two have become friends as theyâ€™ve â€œbeen dancing together now for six weeks, four hours a day every single day.â€

Slater then chimed in, saying of their rehearsals, â€œGuys, itâ€™s intense. Like you really form a very, very special bond, and I think we have similar personalities.â€

Slater added that she and Umansky have forged a â€œsuper supportive relationship.â€

â€œWeâ€™re definitely there for each other,â€ she explained, adding, â€œAnd itâ€™s beautiful. Thatâ€™s a great thing.â€

â€œIt is,â€ agreed Umansky, who then explained what happened before they were photographed hand in hand. They stepped out to a restaurant to get sushi â€œin our rehearsal clothes,â€ he said.

â€œRehearsal clothes,â€ Slater repeated for emphasis, waving her hand over her athletic attire.

Umansky said as the pair left the restaurant, they were â€œrecappingâ€ their week. The two â€œgrabbedâ€ one anotherâ€™s hands as they continued â€œrecapping and summarizingâ€ while walking to their cars.

The paparazzi snapped photos of them and turned the gesture into a â€œblown-out moment,â€ he said.

â€œThatâ€™s it. Hope that clarifies it,â€ he said before assuring fans he and Slater will â€œkeep on dancingâ€ and â€œhaving fun.â€

TODAY.com was directed to Umanskyâ€™s Instagram story after reaching out to his representative for comment. TODAY.com did not hear back from reps for Slater.

Kyle Richards gets emotional talking about her marriage at BravoCon

At BravoCon, Richards got a little emotional when she started talking about her separation from Umansky.

â€œWe love each other very much, and we are family no matter what happens and we have a really strong family unit,â€ she said while tearing up.

â€œWeâ€™re just trying to figure it out. We know we love each other," she said.

â€œThis is not my fairytale clearly,â€ Richards added. â€œI do appreciate all of your support.â€

Kyle Richards clarifies relationship status with Mauricio Umansky

While at BravoCon in Las Vegas, Richards filmed a special episode of "Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen" that aired Nov. 6.

During her appearance, Richards said she wanted to clear up something she said earlier on the red carpet about her and Umansky's marriage that went viral.

â€œI misspoke on the (red) carpet today,â€ she said. â€œTwo times I had to correct someone when they said â€˜divorce.â€™ I said â€˜separated.â€™ And then I went and said it, and then it went everywhere. So, that was my bad.â€

Richards explained that she still views her marriage with Umansky as a "success" even though they're separated at the moment.

â€œWeâ€™re still a love story. I love him very much," she said.

Kyle Richards shares an update on the living situation with Mauricio Umansky

During a Feb. 21 appearance on TODAY with Hoda & Jenna, Richards said that there was trouble brewing in their marriage for quite some time, but she didnâ€™t really give more thought to the relationship struggles until one of her friends died.

â€œI think there were certain things that were there that we had kind of been putting on the back burner for a long time,â€ she said. â€œYou know, youâ€™re pregnant and youâ€™re breastfeeding. And then it was working and juggling the kids and you kind of forget about it and then it resurfaces again. And I think I just kind of came to a, I would say a breaking point, honestly, and Iâ€™ve gone through a lot. I lost my best friend, and I think that really does change you and makes you look at things differently.â€

Richards said learning her friend had died by suicide led her to reassess aspects of her life, including her marriage. She began thinking about what she was â€œwilling to accept and not acceptâ€ in her relationship.

Although it was â€œhardâ€ to decide to split, Richards said she knew it had to be done.

Now, four months after Umansky confirmed their split in an October 2023 interview with People, Richards said they donâ€™t have any ill will toward each other.

â€œSo, the current status is we live under the same roof ... in different rooms,â€ she explained.

The â€œReal Housewives of Beverly Hillsâ€ star noted that Umanksy will â€œcome and goâ€ as he pleases since they have â€œother homes.â€ However, if he decides to stay for dinner, Richards said itâ€™s never a combative situation.

â€œItâ€™s friendly,â€ she explained.

As for how they handled their new relationship status on Season 13 of â€œRHOBH,â€ Richards said it was â€œhardâ€ because when filming began, the pair didnâ€™t let their daughters know that they had already separated.

â€œHe wasnâ€™t really ready to share that,â€ she said of Umansky.

â€œIs there a chance that you guys can make it through this?â€ Jenna Bush Hager asked.

â€œI really donâ€™t know what my future holds right now, to be honest, which is the weirdest part of all of this,â€ Richards said with a laugh. â€œIâ€™ve always had so much stability my entire life.â€

Kyle Richards confirms she and Umansky are 'allowed to' date other people

Despite still living under the same roof, Richards told fans in an Amazon livestream on Feb. 29 that she and Umansky were "allowed to" date other people.

When a fan asked if she was dating anyone new, Richards deflected, saying she wasn't sure how to answer the question.

"We're allowed to," she said of her and her estranged husband. "Weâ€™re allowed to do what we want."

Kyle Richards explains why her and Mauricio Umanskyâ€™s separation wasnâ€™t really on â€˜RHOBHâ€™

In that same Amazon livestream on Feb. 29, she said that they were living under the same roof for now, but itâ€™s not â€œsustainable," before explaining why their separation wasn't seen on "RHOBH."

She explained she hadnâ€™t been allowed to appear on the first season of Umanskyâ€™s Netflix show, â€œBuying Beverly Hills,â€ due to her deal with Bravoâ€™s â€œRHOBH.â€

For the second season, Richards said, the two networks struck a deal and she was allowed to appear on her husbandâ€™s show.

She told fans that she and Umansky werenâ€™t ready to share with the world their marital problems when she was filming the 13th season of â€œRHOBH.â€ But then, as things disintegrated, the Netflix cameras were rolling.

â€œFor anyone who is confused, that (decision to split) happened after we were done filming (â€˜RHOBHâ€™) and the story came out,â€ she explained. â€œThen the Netflix cameras happened to be with us in Aspen so they ended up filming us talking about it.â€

â€œObviously, Bravoâ€™s been following my life for 13 years. Itâ€™s not like (Netflix) can film that scene and then I donâ€™t share that with the viewers of â€˜The Housewives,â€™â€ she added. â€œSo we ended up shooting that scene â€” both for â€˜Buying Beverly Hillsâ€™ and â€˜The Real Housewives of Beverly Hillsâ€™â€ â€” after we were all wrapped and the story ended up coming out.â€

Richards went on to confirm that she and Umansky are discussing living separately, but for now are just â€œeasing into things.â€

â€œWeâ€™re fortunate that we donâ€™t fight and we get along,â€ she said. â€œIt oddly works. But ... at some point, you have to be like â€˜OK, itâ€™s the new normal but I donâ€™t think itâ€™s sustainable.â€™â€

Kyle Richards removes 'Umansky' from her name on Instagram

Richards recently removed â€œUmanskyâ€ from her name on Instagram. As of May 2, it just reads Kyle Richards instead of what she previously had: Kyle Richards Umansky.

It is not immediately known when she removed the name, but fans noticed the change in the first week of May.
